gremlins.gameObjects

Class Wizard

  • java.lang.Object
    • gremlins.gameObjects.Wizard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, GameObject, Movement

    public class Wizard
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameObject, Drawable, Movement
    Represents a wizard game object that can be drawn and moved.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean isDead
